verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David יְ֭הֹוָה <WH3068> LORD מִי־ <WH4310> who יָג֣וּר <WH1481> who shall abide בְּאָהֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH168> tent מִֽי־ <WH4310> who יִ֝שְׁכֹּ֗ן <WH7931> may dwell בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> hill קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> in thy holy

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> He that walketh תָּ֭מִים <WH8549> uprightly וּפֹעֵ֥ל <WH6466> and worketh צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> righteousness וְדֹבֵ֥ר <WH1696> and speaketh אֱ֝מֶ֗ת <WH571> the truth בִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <WH3824> in his heart

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor רָגַ֨ל ׀ <WH7270> [He that] backbiteth עַל־ <WH5921> against לְשֹׁנ֗וֹ <WH3956> not with his tongue לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> nor doeth לְרֵעֵ֣הוּ <WH7453> to his neighbour רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> evil וְ֝חֶרְפָּ֗ה <WH2781> a reproach לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor נָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> nor taketh up עַל־ <WH5921> against קְרֹֽבוֹ׃ <WH7138> against his neighbour

נִבְזֶ֤ה ׀ <WH959> is contemned בְּֽעֵ֘ינָ֤יו <WH5869> In whose eyes נִמְאָ֗ס <WH3988> a vile person וְאֶת־ <WH853> יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> them that fear יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD יְכַבֵּ֑ד <WH3513> but he honoureth נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> [He that] sweareth לְ֝הָרַ֗ע <WH7489> to [his own] hurt וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יָמִֽר׃ <WH4171> and changeth

כַּסְפּ֤וֹ ׀ <WH3701> his money לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> [He that] putteth not out בְּנֶשֶׁךְ֮ <WH5392> to usury וְשֹׁ֥חַד <WH7810> reward עַל־ <WH5921> against נָקִ֗י <WH5355> against the innocent לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor לָ֫קָ֥ח <WH3947> nor taketh עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> He that doeth אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these לֹ֖א <WH3808> Nor יִמּ֣וֹט <WH4131> be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> these [things] shall never
